page.title: 05Shalford School Today (cont)
page.content: A large climbing frame has been ordered. We have television, video, radio and cassette recorders, camera, computer (but no printer yet), cooker, sewing machine and kiln. We began this term with 54 pupils but we now have some{American}children from{Wethersfield Airbase. }Many of us come from{Panfield}by{Eastern National {Bus.}We start at 9.15 as the bus is due at 9.10. We have lunch 12.15-1.15 and end at 3.30 with 15min breaks both a.m. and p.m. At 11yrs we mostly go to{Tabor High School, Braintree. As well as reading, maths and English we do sporting activities and art and craft including cooking, needlework, pottery, lace making, etc. There are recorder classes too. On Friday mornings almost all go by coach to{Riverside Pool, Braintree for a half-hour swimming lesson.
